themes: local hiring and representation of people of color
modernizing technology and equipment in recreation centers
maximizing use of existing neighborhood spaces
key_phrases: People of color producing and working events
update City equipment, tech, and spaces to keep up with industry standards
The City owns many properties but lacks the funds and attention to keep the facilities up to date
Rec Centers could all be updated to have functioning tech
more usable spaces if the city-owned spaces were renovated
add performance pavillions outside, outdoor shade and better parking
barriers_identified: lack of funding and attention for facility maintenance
limited usable spaces due to lack of renovation
solutions_proposed: hire locally and ensure people of color are producing and working events
update city equipment, technology, and spaces
renovate existing city-owned spaces rather than acquiring new venues
update Rec Centers to have functioning tech
add outdoor performance pavilions, shade, and better parking
